name: Lunar Lander (itch) (Burden)
description:
A re-creation of the 1979 arcade game Lunar lander in Godot.

It differs from the original as the levels are procedural their are a few minor details missing as well as the physics not acting the same, but is still very much like the original.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS

A,D - Rotate Lander

SHIFT - Thrust up

CONTROL  - Thrust down

Z - Thrust max

X - Thrust zero

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Project files are available, made in Godot V3.2.1 written in C#

(The project is a bit of a mess as it was only made in a few days and I'm still learning how to properly structure Godot projects)
